data.Sentence_cn: 消防队员们同那场森林大火搏斗了将近3个星期才最后把火势控制住。
data.Sentence: Firemen had been fighting the forest fire for nearly three weeks before they could get it under control.

data.Sentence_cn: 就在不久之前，参天大树还覆盖着方圆数英里的土地。
data.Sentence: A short time before, great trees had covered the countryside for miles around.

data.Sentence_cn: 而现在，发热的地面上仍然升腾着烟雾，弥漫在荒凉的山丘上。
data.Sentence: Now, smoke still rose up from the warm ground over the desolate hills.

data.Sentence_cn: 冬季即将来临，这些山丘对周围的村庄具有毁灭性的威胁，
data.Sentence: Winter was coming on and the hills threatened the surrounding villages with destruction,

data.Sentence_cn: 因为大雨不仅会冲走土壤，而且还会引起严重的水灾。
data.Sentence: for heavy rain would not only wash away the soil but would cause serious floods as well.
When the fire had at last been put out,

data.Sentence_cn: 森林管理当局订购了好几吨一种生长迅速的特殊类型的草籽。
data.Sentence: the forest authorities ordered several tons of a special type of grass-seed which would grow quickly.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机把这种草籽大量地撒播在地上。
data.Sentence: The seed was sprayed over the ground in huge quantities by aeroplanes.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机撒播近一个月后，开始下起雨来。
data.Sentence: The planes had been planting seed for nearly a month when it began to rain.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而到那时，很多地方的草已经生了根。
data.Sentence: By then, however, in many places the grass had already taken root.

data.Sentence_cn: 一片片的绿草开始出现在这片烧焦的土地上，代替了多少世纪以来一直生长在那里的参天大树。
data.Sentence: In place of the great trees which had been growing there for centuries, patches of green had begun to appear in the blackened soil.
